name: auth

scripts.deploy:local: next build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env local
scripts.deploy:dev: next build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env dev
scripts.deploy:prod: next build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env prod
